DDescription.description: Scans a directory in the Intershop shared file system for its content recursively.
Specifies wether the directory should be scanned recursively or not. The default value is 'true'
The directory path relative to the location within the units shared content specified by 'UnitDirectory'. It points to the directory that sould be browsed.
Must be a directory. This is the base directory where the DirectoryPath (or the DefaultDirectoryPath) is appended to form the actual directory.
A Directory object that represents the content of the target directory.
